backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two completed features: global white/yellow color theme update and card background colors across all pages.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing the 8-page React application with TanStack Router, yellow/white theme, and card components with varied background colors.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles with OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes, using grayscale values (no yellow theme applied here).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the ARS Consulting Website React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component configuring TanStack Router with 8 routes (Home, About, Services, GCC, Industries, Insights, Careers, Contact) and shared Header/Footer layout.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with company info, navigation links, LinkedIn social link, copyright notice, and Caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive navigation header with logo, desktop/mobile menus, and active route highlighting for all 8 pages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook for managing ICP backend actor instances with authentication support, automatically invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for future React Query hooks when backend functionality is added.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a white and yellow professional theme, including light/dark mode color schemes for UI components, cards, charts, and borders.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: About page component displaying company story, mission/vision cards, and leadership team section with hero banner and multiple content sections using custom card color variants.
frontend/src/pages/Careers.tsx: Careers page component featuring company benefits list, open job positions with details, and an application form with file upload functionality for candidate submissions.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page component with a contact form for inquiries and a section displaying company contact information including email, phone, location, and LinkedIn.
frontend/src/pages/GCC.tsx: Global Capability Centers service page showcasing GCC benefits, a three-phase approach (Assess, Setup, Scale) with detailed steps, and call-to-action for consultation.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Homepage component with hero section, services overview (GCC, AI transformation, talent, delivery), company differentiators, industries served, and engagement process steps.
frontend/src/pages/Industries.tsx: Industries page component displaying five industry verticals (Banking, Healthcare, Retail, Technology, Manufacturing) with icons, descriptions, and key capabilities in colored card layouts.
frontend/src/pages/Insights.tsx: Insights page component showing thought leadership articles across four categories (GCC Trends, AI in Enterprises, Global Delivery Strategy, Talent Market Insights) with filtering badges and article metadata.
frontend/src/pages/Services.tsx: Services page component presenting four core service offerings (GCC, AI Transformation, Talent, Managed Delivery) with icons and detailed capability lists in colored cards.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color palette using OKLCH color space, including card color variants (yellow, amber, warm, light), extended typography, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document for ARS Consulting website, listing architectural notes, existing features (home page sections, about page, services, industries), and multi-page structure with B2B enterprise focus.
